attributes.action: scrap unfair system of taxation to disabled people for private transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
my wife and two of my children are registered blind but only receive the low to middle rate of dla.

they rely on the car for transport. i am not happy that due to unfair laws we still have to pay for a tax disc and insurance when others who are on a high dla payment can get theirs for free.

i state anyone who has a disability should be entitled to equal service in this matter as their transport needs.
